title: Super Micro Computer shares take a dive after announcing stock offering
description: The newest high-flyer on the S&P 500 want to sell another 2 million shares
keywords: SUPER MICRO COMPUTER, OPENAI, Business, Finance, Sundar Pichai, Artificial intelligence, Andy Jassy, TESLA, Fabless semiconductor companies, Generative artificial intelligence, GPGPU, Intel, Satya Nadella, Google, Nvidia, Microsoft, Arm Holdings, American brands, Elon Musk, Supermicro, ChatGPT, Quartz
